Ingredients: 
 Pasta, Tomato Sauce, Garlic, Olive Oil, Salt, Pepper. 
Steps: 
 1. Cook pasta. 
 2. Prepare sauce. 
 3. Mix together and serve.

Ingredients: 
 Dough, Tomato Sauce, Cheese, Pepperoni, Vegetables. 
Steps: 
 1. Prepare dough. 
 2. Add sauce and toppings. 
 3. Bake in oven.

Ingredients: 
 Lettuce, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Olives, Feta Cheese, Olive Oil. 
Steps: 
 1. Chop vegetables. 
 2. Mix in a bowl. 
 3. Add dressing and serve.
This recipe served 2 adults, a toddler and a baby. It becomes a very thick sauce when added to the pasta if using with both cheeses...
